summary: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.
cast: Bruce Lyons|Chris Haywood|Hamish Gough|Marshall Napier|Noel Appleby|Paul Livingston|Sarah Peirse|Mark Wheatley|Tony Herbert|Jessica Cardiff-Smith|Roy Wesney|Kathleen-Elizabeth Kelly|Jay Saussey|Charles Walker|Desmond Kelly|Bill Le Marquand|Jay Laga'aia|Norman Fairley|Alistair Babbage|Barron Christian
title: Navigator, una odisea en el tiempo
